content.detailedDescription: Four orange sphere shape flying fast speed .No sound seem to be droping in a waving manner and descending down in steps. three spheres to the middle moving up and down.  there were two satellites after sighting,one minute later that crossed over path in opposite direction. the second satellite maybe 20 min. later going in same flight path as ufos. i got nervous,all the hairs on my body stood up.  i lost sight of ufos as they flew over neigghbor's house. this is the third time this month i have seen strange lights, oct.8 /08 4:00am saw small light just to the left of orion that became so big i leaned back and it blinded my eye for a secound and felt it in the back of my eye.
content.summary: Four  lite orange sphere shape flying in formation  ,no sound moving fast ,third sphere to  middle moving up and down ,going north towards pomona c.A.

content.detailedDescription:
Upon enhancement of a picture extracted from the near ir webcam, i noticed that the ufo had a hud display on the window (heads up display).  my suggestion is the hud is a street map.

i've attached an edited for length video sequence, and close up enhanced pictures of the window on the ufo with the hud display.  i am amazed by this...
content.summary: Ufo with window

content.detailedDescription:
I diden���t believe, now i���m an sceptic.
anyway this is what me and my girlfriend see:

i was with my girlfriend in my home, an atic in valencia city center, spain, in june. it was about 11 pm and we was watching tv. then we ear an small aeroplane flying abobe and low (cesna tipe) and we go outside to the terrace to see it. we see the plane with the position lights going from south east to north west. there was hight clouds and the sky looks yelowish because city lights. we stay looking at the plane until it was far away over the city buildings. then we saw two pair of tree circle lights appearing at the same altitude of the plane, from the right (north) going toward the plane. i realize about some facts that make me think these two objects was not planes or copters. in the first place the tree lights of each object were palid yelow an circular, two lights in the botton, and other in the top, like a triangle.  the lights of the objects were not flashing, like the cesna lights, and not red green like in a plane. more odd was that the object lights were perfec circles, not common lights with that you see with filaments (like the cesna lights). also the two objects were flying around the cessna right and left, and right, and the lights configuration never changed. if the lights were placed in wings the perspective would make change the triangle in the rotations, but in this case, the triangle have the same visual configuration, no matter wich movement the objects make, also them change direction too quick for a plane. the cessna plane looks not to realize the objects were there, or if the pilot see it, he not chage the course and follow straight. about two minutes after the objects appear they go away for the right (north). 
the following days i was searching in press for some report, but i cant find nothing.

that���s all about this observation.
regards
content.summary: 2 ufos like 3 light circle each one.

content.detailedDescription:
Well, it was a usual morning. i was on the bus to school. i was kind of bored and thinking about space and the universe, etc. well, i just happened to look up towards a house and some trees. that's when i saw it. when i first spotted it, i thought it was just a low flying plane. then i noticed it wasn't moving and made no noise (at least no noise audible over the loud bus engine). it had four sides, but was more of a triangular shape. like a diamond, almost. there were five lights on it, four being bright white lights, one being a bright red. the craft itself was a dark color. the white lights were on the edges. there were 3 at what i assume was the back of the craft, one at the front tip, and the red light was in the center. well, naturally i locked my eyes on it. it wasn't moving, but the bus evidently was. the bus kept going, though if i could have stopped it i would have. we went down a hill and some trees and houses blocked the object, when we came back up to where it would be visible, it had vanished. it didn't scare me, but made me curious. i've heard reports of people being repeatedly visited by the same craft. hopefully my new friends come to see me on the way to school again. :)

i've attached a quit ms paint sketch of what the craft looked like.
content.summary: Riding the bus to school, when i looked up and saw this ufo hovering about 100-200 ft above the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
This ufo, with one small companion orb in one frame, swung over my home in a split second, and was captured in seven frames on my near ir converted webcam.  moved extremely fast, and where it headed was unknown.  

i get the impression a lot of these ufos are interested in calgary's traffic patterns, as i live beside a major intersection in calgary.

some of these ufos are hard to see, as they are reflecting so my ir signature.
content.summary: Shark tooth flying saucer

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on hwy411 with my daughters from the movies an i noticed a hugh bright white light. i asked both my daughters do you see that? what is that? the more i drove the closer i got to the light. i then saw that it was about 600feet or so in the air an it wasn't moving. it was just hovering there. i then rolled my window down an there was no sound. as i drove under it i then could see one smaller red light on the side surrounded by several very bright smaller white lights. the object than went away as quickly as it came. i was close enough to really see it for around a minute but could see it from a distance for atleast 5minutes or so. sorry to say i didn't get any pictures. it was dark an i was on the hwy so wasn't safe.I felt excited when i got close enough to see. i have never seen anything quiet like this an don't know if i will again. after i was home for around 20minutes or so i got in my car an went back on the hwy to see if i could see it again, but of course i didn't. i even took the camara this time. needless to say i will from here on out pack the camara in the car!!!!
content.summary: Bright front white light one small red light on side surrounded by several bright white lights

content.detailedDescription:
Short, 2 second video showing ufo sweeping into frame overhead, then leaving
in unknown direction.  ufo appears chevron shaped.  house blocked off view of where ufo went...
content.summary: Ufo swoops overhead, leaves in unknown direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on 124th ave. ne in kirkland, washington, the time was just past noon, the sky was perfectly clear of clouds.  i noticed in the sky before me what appeared to be a white vertical dash, it was about 1 ��� inches long at arm���s length.  at first i thought it was one of those ���invisible��� white planes extracting a chem/con trail but it was descending downward at a very slight angle and it was moving very slowly, in fact i couldn���t tell it was moving at all for several minutes.    it may have been space junk, except there was a tiny red light that flashed just below and to the right of it.  
i took a pic with my cell phone through the windshield of my jeep, and was surprised at the spectacular shot that i captured! (see pics below).  i then took another pic out my driver���s side window, which was not very well aimed.  the second pic doesn���t show as much stuff around it, but you can tell it is there.  i continued to watch it for 5-10 minutes more as it started to fade a bit and went behind some trees.  would like to know if anybody else saw this or got pictures.
content.summary: Descending white dash looking thing with spectacular pic!

content.detailedDescription: Update to report filed earlier today on bright red ball spewing sparks. the object was on the left side of the car, heading south on hwy 400. orion was visible. october 21 and 22 are the orionids meteor shower. this shower has often been reported with fireballs or bolides. watching the media for any signs it impacted in innisfil, or cookstown.
content.summary: Red fireglobe barrieontario october 22, 5:23 am

content.detailedDescription:
Note: there appears to be an hourglass shaped ufo, which in fact looks like two saucers, and one saucer is getting a "tow" from another saucer using some sort of beam.

this video is extremely brief, approximately 1/2 second in duration, but i've extracted ufo images from the video.  this video is edited for brevity from original
content.shape: Disc,  Square,  Rectagular,  Star-like,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Several ufo flying over school

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were leaving the church where we served on weekends to head back to lincoln christian seminary in lincoln il. we were in the kaskaskia river bottom land, on a gravel road. my wife thought she saw something in the sky before we entered some trees by the river. i said, "that must be a helicopter or an airplane." she said, "that was no helicopter or an airplane!" we crossed the wren bridge (a plank affair in those days) and up a steep bluff in our vw bug, past a farm house, then turned right on a road--actually, a dusty, two-wheel track. we were heading for the blacktop road to ramsey il, a tiny town on route 51 north of vandalia il and west of where we were. suddenly my wife yelled, "what's that?!"  i stopped the car and looked off to my left. there was a huge thing, the size of a big ranch house, floating in the air about 1/4 mile away. we stared at it and began to be afraid. "what is that?" she asked. "i don't know," i said. we sat and watched it about 20 seconds. suddenly, it began moving toward us! we were terrified. i was frantically trying to get the vw in reverse, but in my panic i couldn't find reverse. she yelled, "turn off the lights!" i did. the thing stopped. it sat there slowly floating, maybe 400 yards away. it had transluscent things that looked sort of like windows, and a light would blink in one, then the next, going from left to right. both ends of the thing had a red glow. now i had a 35 mm camera that i had been using to do night photos of the moon, clouds, and other things. it was loaded and in the back seat, but in our panic, neither of us even thought of it until much later. we watched the thing for maybe a minute. it slowly tilted up away from us, and then went off to the west at about a 45 degree angle into the sky, silently and with tremendous speed. it disappeared in about a second. "what was that?" we kept asking each other. i put the vw in gear and went on down to the next turn, a left turn. just after turning left, my wife yelled, "there it is again!" i almost ran off the road. i stopped and we sat there and watched the thing for about 2 minutes. it was again back near where we had been. it floated there for a while, tilted up toward the west again, and sped off at great speed.  all the way back to lincoln il my wife kept watching the sky. i said, "we've gotta tell someone." we ended up going by my major professor's house for my masters degree. he was up, studying. we knocked softly on his back door, and he came to the door. i said, "we just saw a flying saucer." he invited us in and went and woke up his family--his wife and two daughters. they came and sat at the table. we sat at that table and recounted the whole story. his wife said, "why don't you tell the police?" i said, "they don't know us; they'd just think we were a couple of wierdos." their kids, though young at the time, remember that night to this day. [one of the daughters is the wife of a college president. we were privileged to work together at a college a few years back.] anyway--later on we talked to my older brother. he was one of two government advisors back then, over the manned space project. when we started to tell him the story in southern ca, he separated us into two rooms and had us draw a picture and explain what happened. we gave them to him later on, and he said, "i'll see that general lemay gets these." he was to be in a meeting with him later that month. the next time i talked to my brother, he assured me that he had given those two papers to lemay, who was then the general over the u s air force. lemay, dave said, glanced at the pictures and said, "oh, yes. we know about these. they aren't terrestrial." they had a further conversation i will not include here. if i'd seen this by myself, i would never have told anyone....
content.summary: It looked like a bowl facing down on top of a saucer--with "windows."

content.detailedDescription:
October 22, 2008, 5.23 am. while travelling southbound on the morning commute to toronto on the 400 highway, wife witnessed a large bright red, circular light low in the horizon moving north to south. was sighted just south of barrie ontario. the light/object appeared to be streaking over innisfil, or perhaps cookstown.

the object/light spewed white and red sparks as it moved. it flashed for a few seconds, then it just winked out as if a light switch had been pulled. observation time total- about fifteen seconds.

it was the size of pencil eraser at arms length, and very bright.

was it a true uap or a piece of space junk; meteor or otherwise? she would like to know if others saw this uap.
content.summary: Brilliant red circular fireball/light spewing sparks from rear

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i experienced what we believe was an ufo event. i am recounting the event as accurately as possible. we are responsible and respected educators. we have no desire for publicity, and wish our reputations to remain intact. therefore, we are providing this anonymously. we hope that it can be corraborated by other sources.  

we were hiking on a bear tooth trail on june 15 or 16, 2007 in shenandoah national park, virginia. at around 8:30-9:00 we reached the ���bear tooth��� section of the trail. it is an area along a ridge characterized by sharp granite/basalt outcropping (hence ���bear tooth���) that leads to a mountain. the spot is a favorite of ours - hard to get to, but wonderful for viewing sunsets. the weather that day was good. some clouds with cool temperatures. there was a breeze. 

during the last hundred meters or so, we experienced an odd crackling/tingling sensation with the rocks (you must crawl up and over large rock sections/faces at this point). we had never encountered this before (anywhere). not unpleasant, just strange, we passed it off as static electricity. everything else was normal. 

upon reaching the top, we sat, pulled out the wine, crackers, and cheese to begin our ���picnic.��� within minutes of cracking the bottle, we saw a pink light coming from the west hugging the mountains. we could not determine if it was over the valley or not, but its elevation was roughly the same as ours or slightly lower). the sun had more or less set by that time. the light came and went (not flashing, it was moving ��� sometimes pinkish, sometimes blue), blocked from full view by ridgelines beyond ours it had no discernable shape. 

we strained to find the object. then, as if playing a game it reappeared to our left. just as suddenly, it shifted to the right (or north) passing behind another ridgeline. again, it appeared to our left, but closer (somehow it had moved up along the side of the mountain without our seeing it ��� maybe it turned its lights off). by then, it seemed to have a shape, triangular with a reflective surface. once again, it disappeared. 

we waited a few minutes. as if on cue, the object reappeared to our right, much closer about 200-300 meters away. this time, its shape was clear ��� triangular (like a slice of pie) with smooth colored surface (it shimmered - maybe). no sound emanated from it. it stopped and hovered. we could not see any movement from the trees below (like propeller prop wash). the object must have been several meters long at minimum and a few meters thick, the shape of a fat piece of pie. no holes, bumps, etc. were visable. there may have been lines or shapes drawn on it.  

suddenly, another object appeared (from around the ridge line) sort of like the first was playing snap the whip and pulled it along. it was a white faintly glowing sphere (smaller). it disappeared behind the triangular object. the objects (one now unseen) remained in place for at least one minute, maybe two.

my wife says it twinkled (i didn���t see this). then, in a flash, it backed up and around the ridgeline from where it came. we looked on hoping to see it again, when we caught a flash to our left. it reappeared where we���d previously seen it. again, only faster this time, it backtracked so quickly we could barely follow it. a few seconds later, we caught what we think was the object ���skipping��� towards the western horizon, turning right (northward) and shooting into another mountain range (across the valley). 

for the record, we had taken about two sips each of wine up to that final point. we were never fearful ��� more like utterly amazed. while sorely tempted (sometimes we feel as if we are crawling out of our skins), we have told no one, including family, of the event. it has changed our opinions of ufo���s (we now watch the shows on tv), and have read more on the internet. 

i think it was a government project. she doesn���t know what to think. previously, in 2000, we witnessed another strange event from hawksbill (another mountain in the shenandoah national park). however, it paled in comparison ��� that time an object flying straight and level in a north to south direction that flared and trailed some sort of glowing material for a second or two). 

we saw mufon on tv. i figured someone else may have reported a similar event on or about those dates somewhere near the park or in the valley. we will follow the mufon website in hopes of seeing something to the effect. thank you for your time and consideration.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An event in the shenandoah national park june 2007

content.detailedDescription:
At about 05:35 i let my dog out to the backyard. i normally look at the stars. today the moon was almost on its new moon phase so i could see many stars. i like to look at them. about 1 minute into it, what appeared to be a meteor skipped on the atmosphere from southeast to southwest. the sky is extremely clear due to the cold, and there were no clouds at that time, i was begging myself to breakout the telescope.

maybe 45 seconds after this i looked west because something caught my attention. i thought it may be a military plane since the airport is twenty minutes away, and sometimes they change their landing patern. but it was about 400 to 500 feet up, and moving fast. i noticed it was about the size of a dime if i extended my arm. what caught my eye really was the amount of flashing lights. then i realized that the lights were all around the object. i retired from the military, and qualified lookout. i had not seen this one before, so i stood there looking. about 200 feet behind was a smaller craft approaching fast. i recognized the lighting patern on that one, typical of regular aircraft, lights on wing tips, lights on wings, light on top and at rear. five white one red. the larger craft was different in that the lights flashed at a rapid rate, and seemed to circle the craft. som lights would seem to rotate on the bottom, but the patern seemed to reflect a disc. the small craft probably came as close as 100 feet and then the large craft sped up and it looked like the little one was having a hard time keeping up.

the whole scene took about a minute and a half, they went from south to north in a straight line parrallel to where i stood. about then my dog wanted to come in so i started to turn around and looked up once again to see another meteor skip, this time from east to west. i went in and told my wife about the coincidence of the meteors but omitted the ufo sighting. then we left for work.
content.summary: Ufo chased by aircraft

content.detailedDescription: While walking outside with my wife taking out the home trash in the evening, we turned around to look at the clear cool sky. towards our south we observed the full moon and a star to its 7o'clock position or rather its lower left. this i took it to be a planet since i used to star gaze. we walked to the container which was about 30 yards from us. upon turning back walking to the door, we observed another bright object between the moon and planet. this was yellow, redish in color and as bright at the planet. we were perplexed and observed it for about 3 minutes. then it started to fade as it began to move very slowly in a norther direction until it faded completely out. the object was stationary at first. we had no clue what is was. we did observe a commercial jet minutes later passing thru the same area and its blinking collision lights were visible but way too dim to be the same size as the object. till now we have no clue what it was.
content.summary: Appeared out of no where as bright as a star then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was wondering if you heard of any sightings over wichita late friday afternoon between 4-5pm?  i was driving south on i-135 and to my left there was what appeared to be an oval-shaped object, white, with a blue "wing" or "fin" to either side. my eyes could have been playing tricks on me but my wife also noted that it was just hovering for a minute and when we circled around to see what it was it was moving upward at about 30-35 degrees, gaining speed until it just disappeared. my wife said that it had to have been a blimp but i never heard of a blimp that flew that high up in the air. we weren't the only ones who saw it. several cars on 135 slowed down to look at it.
content.summary: A white, possibly oval-shaped object with a short blue wing on either side of object hovering east of i-135. started moving slowly like a blimp and then took off and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the 4th of july, 2008. we had many people over to watch the fireworks on long lake in commerce twp. it was about 10:30-11:00 pm, we were watching the fireworks over the lake when we noticed an object moving east across the lake. we saw what appeared to be a very bright large sphere like object come from across the lake, it was heading west. i would say maybe 1 mile high. 
we all saw the object move slow across the sky over the lake. i would say it was travleing about as fast as a small plane. as it past over us we lost sight of it through the trees, we ran towards the back of the house but the object was gone out of sight by then. this was no firework or satellite. it was very large and had a bright red glow, it was moving in a straight horizontal path. i know everyone on that lake that night would have seen it, because they were all shooting off fireworks over the lake. i tried to get a picture of it with my cell phone but it was gone by the time i had it ready to take a picture.
content.summary: Red sphere like object moving accross the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=q4s5c_sqavq
eh, was up on saddleback mountain riding my motorcycle and had my little cheap dv aiptek camera with me as its easy to carry and not much loss if i crash.  at one point i got one right next to me and also saw one that revealed itself through what seemed to be a light portal.  see the video, if you want.  all true and lately seemingly a daily experience that most can't see.  i went to the top of the mountain to catch the sunset and had a "feeling."  the objects seemed to skip like a stone and were completely noticeable and rather touch n go.  there seemed to be a really large one in the clouds (mother) that these smaller ones interfaced with drones.  one of them seemed as curious as me and looked through a dimensional light breach portal (see pics).  my feeling was well you look neat but can you give me a ride...  and the ride was more like a dimensional tangent and buzzing sound, which was annoying.  i didn't lose sight of the object, seemed to follow me down the hill.  despite the noise the light show was great.  several people drove by, but i didn't bring it to their attention and they didn't seem to notice, i didn't want to scare off the buggers.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Several dimensional light craft & boomerang

content.detailedDescription: This is a very short duration event, in seconds
content.summary: One ufo, bouncing around above school yard

content.detailedDescription:
Was running track timing sprints at henderson junior high when i noticed an object materializing over rock creek. around 400 feet long as compared to football field i was practicing at an object had diameter i would place around 60 feet for each cylinder. ther were three cylinders about 60 feet apart each and they were joined by cylinder cross beams to each main cylinder. there was no noise, no reflection from sunlight and no lights.
i would assume a craft made for exploration would not have lights for anti-collision as surely they would be much better equipted for flight than planes.
i observed this object as it slowly appeare3d and it was not moving. i observed for about 9 minutes and then began to run home which was only 8 blocks away. i told my daddy what i seen and he got his 8 mm camera and we drove back to aschopol. the object was gone.
the object was about 1000 feet above rock creek.
i called little rock airforce base to see if radar had seen image and little rock airport. there was no sighting on radar. i asked many who lived in my neighborhood if they had seen object. no one else observed object.
this has never led me to believ that what i saw was optical or imagined. i know the ship was real and have searched for others who have seen same type object.
content.summary: Cylinder object, no reflection, no sound, no lights

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were taking a a smoke break  outside, when we heard this odd noise.

the best way i can describe the noise is that it sounded like an incoming missile. almost as if something was breaking the sound barrier, or trying to enter or leave the earths atmosphere. 

the sound started off quiet as if far away, and after a few seconds was near deafening. upon hearing the sound, we looked up in the sky and noticed what 
appeared to be a star, except it was moving. upon looking at the star-like object closer we realized it was flashing different colors, red, blue, green, maybe even some yellow........And it was doing this very fast. 

i noticed that on the ufo stalker website there are alot of similar experiences lately, all describing what i am describing.

i just thought i'd let everyone know they aren't alone, and i too have seen this mysterious star-like light
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Out for smoke break..Saw a moving star...Heard a strange noise

content.detailedDescription:
I've attached the original video, a digital video of a near infrared webcam, which shows a classic, saucer shaped ufo that moves into the picture 
2.41 minutes into the video, makes a turn towards the east.

the second event is two ufos flying in formation 104 seconds after first event - these ufo are also moving east at extremely high speed
please open the edited for brevity video, unless you wish to be bored by the original waiting for the ufos to pop up.
content.summary: Two events, all saucers

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i where driveing to the store(circle k)when we noticed a bright lite out over the ocean.And on our way back i had seen it go out(disappeared) and thougt it was odd,i told my dad because he didnt see it go out,at first we thought it was a planet,but planets dont disappear,so we drove back to the house fast to grab my telescope.When we arrived at the beach(harris beach state park)it was changing all kinds of colors(red,green,yellow,blue),it was barley moving at all,we also noticed a boat out on the ocean also ,pointed toward the object,as if it(boat)was seeing it too.We also seen a plane flying by it with a really dim red lite,like faa running lites.My dad watched it most the time with his eyes,while i looked at it with the telescope,we both watched it  dissapear then return,until it finnaly dissapeared altogether,then we seen the boat turn around as if wasnt likeing what it had seen.We stayed there for about another 10 mininutes until we went back home.Iv seen ufo's before with my mom,freinds,freinds of family,and now dad.Its a cool feeling to see these things that arn't suposed to exsist.S.T.W
content.summary: Multi-colored ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Traveling (south) east on turnpike 76 from harmarville, pa to monroeville exit i noticed a bright large star-like light out left                        front window.  thought it was a very bright star then suddenly it moved from stationary position to the right really fast, stopped, then faded out completely.  the estimation of the amount of travel is about two feet at arms length in about 2 seconds at most.  the light made some sort of lighted trail the length of travel, that did not linger. probably 35 degrees high in sky.  not knowing the objects size, i can't tell how far away it was, but guessing it was maybe over highway 286 or past it towards murrysville or farther?
content.summary: Large bright light that moved from one point to another fast, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for my kids bus.I noticed through the car window, a star moving back and forth. we got out of the car and unbeleavable movement.My 3 kids and i watched for about 20 min. after the bus came i ran back to the house and got my wife. she is now a beleaver. we watched for about 45 min. as the sun came up it disapeared.  i will be watching in the morning with camera in hand. look ssw from cooks point 45 deg. up in the sky.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moving at impossible speed , up down all over the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Grilling burgers on my open deck tonight. looked up at se sky at 2 larger-than-jupiter, twinkling, white star-like objects about 25-30 degrees up above tree line (about an inch at arm's length apart).  thought they were strange, not only for being so large, but it puzzled me that i didn't recognize what constellation they could be in... as i wondered, the smaller light on the right faded to nothing (in about 2-3 seconds), then the larger left one did the same.  the sky had some clouds that were white floating randomly across... thought perhaps a black one had passed in front, so i waited for a couple minutes while the other clouds moved across, and this was not the case... they were gone.  i call them the "greensburg lights" because that was the direction they were in from my house, and because their action was exactly like video taken of the phoenix lights in the way they faded out.
content.summary: Two large star-like stationary objects just faded one at a time just like phoenix lites

content.detailedDescription:
Last night on the 20th of october,i witnessed a unidentified flying object and a military jet fighter was chasing it.
i live in oxnard,calif. up the coast from los angeles on the way to santa barbara. at about 7:45 pm i stepped outside for a  smoke on the front lawn.My house faces to the east on the east side of the city.
i looked up into the sky as i am prone to do because i am a sky watcher by nature.
i glanced to the north and noticed an object flying from the northwest toward the southeast. from santa barbara/ventura direction toward l.A. area. it was dark out at this time so i couldn't make out the shape but i could see two lights on the craft.It was traveling at a very high rate of speed.
then i noticed that behind it at a short distance was another craft.This one had the typical aircraft lights on and also a strobe avoidance light.It was chasing the front craft. as they passed directly to the east of me,i could distinctly hear the jet engine at full throttle on the rear craft and knew it was a military jet. it didn't seem to be making any progress in catching up to the other craft. as they progressed southward the front craft veered back toward the west and the ocean. this would have been in the vicinity of nas point mugu maybe a little east/southeast over the santa monica mountain range.The chase plane matched the course.
by this time, i am standing in the middle of my street to keep them in sight. i watched as they headed out over the ocean in the direction of the channel islands heading roughly toward catalina island. i then watched the rear  plane break off the pursuit and turn sharply northward flying off the coast in the direction of santa barbara.The other craft continued southwest over the ocean until i lost sight of the lights of the craft.
i have no idea what i witnessed. i have seen this before when i lived on the gulf coast when dea or the coast guard would chase smugglers but this was different. what ever that military fighter was chasing it could not catch it.Not many planes that i know can out run a f-16. but this one did easily.
content.summary: Military jet chasing unidentified craft.

content.detailedDescription: Hi  my name is scott adair  back in 1974  my mom was yelling for me to hurry to the window on the second floor.There was a machine the size of 3 or 4 cars hovering outside window.It was round with lights that had colors i didn���t recognize.It made absolutely no sound then it disappeared suddenly.It didn���t have the appearance of gradually taking off.I assume that it left so fast that it gave the appearance of disappearing.My mother and i saw this together.I don���t think it was a hoak or a joke because even today nothing in this world could do that.You are the first person i have told.This happened in cranston rhode island.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking out to my backyard to go to the garage to get some bottled water from the fridge in there.

i stopped to take a look at the sky and i noticed the object sailing across the sky. first of all, it was moving very fast. it was spherical and giving off a fixed red glow. there were no flashing lights or noises. the object smoothly sailed off. i lost sight of the object when it went beyond the horizon.
content.summary: Spherical red object sailing across the sky. no flashing lights or noise.
